name: atscribe-ai-resume-analyzer
description: AI-Powered Dual-Mode Resume Analysis & Recruitment Platform

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: Lakshmi
